dcterms:description: A self-configuring method for deep learning-based biomedical image segmentation, specifically trained to segment bony structures from 3D ultrasound cervical spine images.

dcterms:description: A method for reconstructing 3D data volume from segmented ultrasound images, used for identifying and measuring lamina curve angles in cervical spine imaging.

dcterms:description: An algorithm for automatic measurement of spinous process angles on ultrasound spine images, utilized for filtering outliers in the measurement of lamina curve angles.
dcterms:title: DBSCAN algorithm
